price: Hakika sisi tutaiondoa adhabu kidogo, lakini nyinyi kwa yakini mtarejea vile vile!
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu anawarudi: Sisi hakika tutakuondoleeni adhabu wakati wa duniani, nao ni wakati mchache, lakini nyinyi mtarejea tu, bila ya shaka, yale yale mliyo kuwa mkiyatenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
